import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import css from "./styled.module.css"; import axios from "axios"; const NavBarLeft = () => { const [openBar, setOpenBar] = useState(true); const [userName, setUserName] = useState(""); const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { axios.get(`https://localhost:7221/api/ClientProfile/get-by-id/${localStorage.getItem("id")}`) .then((res) => { setUserName(res.data.name) console.log(res) }) }, []) return ( <> setOpenBar(!openBar)} src="https://img.icons8.com/ios-filled/50/000000/menu--v1.png"/> {openBar ? (
{userName}
navigate("/perfil")}> Perfil
navigate("/perfil/pedidos")}> Pedidos
navigate("/perfil/enderecos")}> Endere√ßos
navigate("/perfil/alterar-senha")}> Alterar senha
navigate("/home")}> Sair
) :
navigate("/perfil")}>
navigate("/perfil/pedidos")}>
navigate("/perfil/enderecos")}>
navigate("/perfil/alterar-senha")}>
} ) } export default NavBarLeft;
